00054 
00055 EuropaReactor::EuropaReactor(xml_arg_type arg)
00056   :TeleoReactor(arg, false), m_assembly(*this), m_core(*this), 
00057    m_filter(NULL) {
00058   bool found;
00059   std::string nddl;
00060   boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type &cfg = TeleoReactor::xml_factory::node(arg);
00061   boost::optional<std::string> model = parse_attr< boost::optional<std::string> >(cfg, "model");
00062 
00063   if( model ) {
00064     if( model->empty() )
00065       throw XmlError(cfg, "Attribute model is empty");
00066     nddl = manager().use(*model, found);
00067     if( !found ) 
00068       throw XmlError(cfg, "Unable to locate model file \""+(*model)+"\"");
00069   } else {
00070     std::string short_nddl = getName().str()+".nddl",
00071       long_nddl = getGraphName().str()+"."+short_nddl;
00072     // locate nddl model 
00073     //   - 1st look for <agent>.<reactor>.nddl
00074     nddl = manager().use(long_nddl, found);
00075     if( !found ) {
00076       // if not found look for jsut <reactor>.nddl
00077       nddl = manager().use(short_nddl, found);
00078       if( !found )
00079        // no model found for this reactor 
00080        throw ReactorException(*this, "Unable to locate \""+long_nddl+"\" or \""+
00081                             short_nddl+"\"");
00082     }
00083   }
00084   // Load the model
00085   if( !m_assembly.playTransaction(nddl) )
00086     throw ReactorException(*this, "model in "+nddl+" is inconsistent.");
00087   
00088   if( !m_assembly.plan_db()->isClosed() ) {
00089     syslog("WARN")<<"Plan Database is not closed:\n"
00090                 <<"\tClosing it now!!\n";
00091     m_assembly.plan_db()->close();
00092   }
00093 
00094   // Now load solver configuration 
00095   std::string solver_cfg = parse_attr<std::string>(xml_factory::node(arg), 
00096                                              "solverConfig");  
00097   if( solver_cfg.empty() )
00098     throw XmlError(xml_factory::node(arg), "solverConfig attribute is empty");
00099   DeliberationFilter::set_current(this);
00100   m_assembly.configure_solver(solver_cfg);
00101   // finally I identify the external end internal timelines
00102   std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId> objs;
00103   m_assembly.trex_timelines(objs);
00104   syslog()<<"Found "<<objs.size()<<" TREX timeline declarations";
00105   
00106   for(std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId>::const_iterator it=objs.begin(); 
00107       objs.end()!=it; ++it) {
00108     EUROPA::LabelStr name = (*it)->getName();
00109     Symbol trex_name(name.c_str()), mode_val;
00110     EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId mode = m_assembly.mode(*it);    
00111     if( !mode->isSpecified() ) 
00112       throw ReactorException(*this, 
00113                           "Mode of timeline "+trex_name.str()+" is not specified");
00114     else {
00115       EUROPA::DataTypeId type = mode->getDataType();
00116       mode_val = type->toString(mode->getSpecifiedValue());
00117     }
00118        
00119     if( Assembly::EXTERNAL_MODE==mode_val || Assembly::OBSERVE_MODE==mode_val ) {
00120       use(trex_name, Assembly::OBSERVE_MODE!=mode_val);      
00121       m_core.set_external(*it); 
00122     } else if( Assembly::INTERNAL_MODE==mode_val ) {
00123       m_assembly.check_default(*it);
00124       provide(trex_name);
00125       if( !isInternal(trex_name) ) {
00126        // Formally it would be better to demote it as External
00127        // but for now we will just hide this timeline to the rest of the world
00128        syslog("WARN")<<"Unable to declare "<<trex_name<<" as Internal ...\n"
00129                     <<"\t making it Private.";
00130       } else 
00131         m_core.set_internal(*it); 
00132     } else if( Assembly::IGNORE_MODE==mode_val ) {
00133       m_assembly.ignore(*it);
00134     } else {
00135       // everything else is just private ...
00136       if( Assembly::PRIVATE_MODE!=mode_val ) 
00137        // should never happen
00138        syslog("WARN")<<"timeline "<<trex_name<<" mode \""<<mode_val<<"\" is unknown.\n"
00139                     <<"\tI'll assume it is Private.";
00140     }
00141   }
00142 }
00143 
00144 EuropaReactor::~EuropaReactor() {}
00145 
00146 bool EuropaReactor::in_scope(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00147   TREX::transaction::TICK 
00148     deadline = getCurrentTick()+getExecLatency()+getLookAhead();
00149   if( !m_assembly.ignored(tok) ) {
00150     EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain start_t = tok->start()->lastDomain(), 
00151       end_t = tok->end()->lastDomain();
00152     return end_t.getUpperBound() >= getCurrentTick() &&
00153       ( start_t.getUpperBound() < getFinalTick() ||
00154        start_t.getLowerBound() <=deadline );
00155   }
00156   return false;
00157 }
00158 
00159 bool EuropaReactor::dispatch_window(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj, 
00160                                 TREX::transaction::TICK &from, 
00161                                 TREX::transaction::TICK &to) {
00162   TREX::utils::Symbol name(obj->getName().toString());
00163   external_iterator pos = find_external(name);
00164   if( pos.valid() && pos->accept_goals() ) {
00165     TREX::transaction::IntegerDomain window = pos->dispatch_window(getCurrentTick());
00166     TREX::transaction::IntegerDomain::bound 
00167       lo = window.lowerBound(), hi = window.upperBound();
00168     from = lo.value();
00169     if( hi.isInfinity() )
00170       to = getFinalTick();
00171     else
00172       to = hi.value();
00173     return true;
00174   }
00175   return false;
00176 }

00180 //  - TREX transaction callback 
00181 
00182 void EuropaReactor::notify(Observation const &o) {
00183   m_assembly.setStream();
00184   {
00185     debugMsg("trex:notify", "["<<getCurrentTick()<<"] new observation "<<o);
00186     std::pair<EUROPA::ObjectId, EUROPA::TokenId> 
00187       ret = m_assembly.convert(o, true);
00188 
00189     if( ret.second.isId() ) {
00190       ret.second->start()->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(getCurrentTick(),
00191                                                         getCurrentTick()));
00192       ret.second->end()->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(getCurrentTick()+1,
00193                                                               PLUS_INFINITY));
00194       m_core.notify(ret);
00195     } else {
00196       syslog("ERROR")<<"Failed to produce observation "
00197                    <<o.object()<<'.'<<o.predicate()<<" inside europa model.";
00198     }
00199   }
00200 }
00201 
00202 void EuropaReactor::handleRequest(goal_id const &g) {
00203   m_assembly.setStream();
00204   {
00205     debugMsg("trex:request", "["<<getCurrentTick()<<"] new request "<<*g);
00206     EUROPA::TokenId tok = m_assembly.convert(*g, false).second;
00207     
00208     if( tok.isId() ) {
00209       // restrict start, duration and end
00210       try {
00211        details::europa_restrict(tok->start(), g->getStart());
00212        details::europa_restrict(tok->duration(), g->getDuration());
00213        details::europa_restrict(tok->end(), g->getEnd());
00214       } catch(DomainExcept const &de) {
00215        syslog("ERROR")<<"Failed to restrict goal "<<g->object()<<'.'<<g->predicate()
00216                      <<'['<<g<<"] temporal attributes: "<<de;
00217        return;
00218       }
00219       m_internal_goals[tok->getKey()] = g;
00220       if( m_assembly.inactive() )
00221        m_assembly.mark_active();
00222     } else {
00223       syslog("WARN")<<"Ignored unknown goal "
00224                   <<g->object()<<'.'<<g->predicate();
00225     }
00226   }
00227 }
00228 
00229 void EuropaReactor::handleRecall(goal_id const &g) {
00230   m_assembly.setStream();
00231   
00232   debugMsg("trex:recall", "["<<getCurrentTick()<<"] recalled "<<*g);
00233   for(europa_mapping::iterator i=m_internal_goals.begin(); 
00234       m_internal_goals.end()!=i; ++i)
00235     if( i->second==g ) {
00236       EUROPA::eint key = i->first;
00237       m_internal_goals.erase(i);
00238       
00239       // Need to notify the europa solver
00240       m_core.recall(key);
00241       return;
00242     }
00243 }

00245 //  - TREX execution callbacks
00246 
00247 void EuropaReactor::handleInit() {
00248   m_assembly.setStream();
00249   {
00250     
00251     debugMsg("trex:exec", "Beginning initialization");
00252     // Now is the time to set my timing constants in the model
00253     EUROPA::PlanDatabaseId db = m_assembly.plan_db();
00254     
00255     
00256     EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId 
00257       mission_end = db->getGlobalVariable(Assembly::MISSION_END),
00258       tick_duration = db->getGlobalVariable(Assembly::TICK_DURATION), 
00259       clock_var = db->getGlobalVariable(Assembly::CLOCK_VAR);
00260     
00261     if( mission_end.isNoId() )
00262       throw ReactorException(*this, "Unable to locate "+
00263                           Assembly::MISSION_END.toString()+
00264                           " in the model");
00265     if( tick_duration.isNoId() )
00266       throw ReactorException(*this, "Unable to locate "+
00267                           Assembly::TICK_DURATION.toString()+
00268                           " in the model");
00269     if( clock_var.isNoId() )
00270       syslog("WARN")<<"Unable to locate "<<Assembly::CLOCK_VAR.toString()
00271                   <<"in the model";
00272     mission_end->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(getFinalTick(), 
00273                                                        getFinalTick()));
00274     tick_duration->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(tickDuration(),
00275                                                         tickDuration()));
00276     // prepare the clock variable
00277     clock_var->restrictBaseDomain(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(getInitialTick(),
00278                                                      getFinalTick()));
00279     // Next thing is to process facts
00280     m_core.initialize(clock_var);
00281     debugMsg("trex:exec", "End of initialization");
00282   }
00283 }
00284 
00285 void EuropaReactor::handleTickStart() {
00286   m_assembly.setStream();
00287   
00288   debugMsg("trex:exec", "["<<getCurrentTick()<<"] Beginning tick start");
00289   if( getCurrentTick()==getInitialTick() )
00290     reset_deliberation();
00291   m_completedThisTick = false;
00292   TREX::transaction::TICK 
00293     deadline = getCurrentTick()+getExecLatency()+getLookAhead();
00294   
00295   m_filter->set_horizon(getCurrentTick()+1, std::min(getFinalTick(), deadline));
00296   m_core.doDispatch();
00297   debugMsg("trex:exec", "["<<getCurrentTick()<<"] end of tick start");
00298 }
00299 
00300 bool EuropaReactor::synchronize() {
00301   m_assembly.setStream();
00302   debugMsg("trex:exec", "["<<getCurrentTick()<<"] Beginning synchronization");
00303   // m_filter->set_horizon(getCurrentTick(), getCurrentTick()+1);
00304   if( !m_core.synchronize()  ) {
00305     debugMsg("trex:exec", "["<<getCurrentTick()<<"] synchronize failed (1)");
00306     m_assembly.solver().reset();
00307     // doRecalls
00308     m_assembly.mark_inactive();
00309     if( !( m_core.relax(false) && m_core.synchronize()) ) {
00310       debugMsg("trex:exec", "["<<getCurrentTick()<<"] synchronize failed (2)");
00311       m_assembly.mark_inactive();
00312       if( !(m_core.relax(true) && m_core.synchronize()) ) {
00313         syslog()<<"Unable to explain the current state of the world.";
00314        debugMsg("trex:exec", "["<<getCurrentTick()<<"] Failed synchronization");
00315         return false;
00316       }
00317     }
00318   }
00319   // TREX::transaction::TICK 
00320   //   deadline = getCurrentTick()+getExecLatency()+getLookAhead();
00321   
00322   // m_filter->set_horizon(getCurrentTick(), std::min(getFinalTick(), deadline));
00323   m_core.doNotify();
00324   // m_core.archive();
00325   logPlan();
00326   debugMsg("trex:exec", "["<<getCurrentTick()<<"] End synchronization");
00327   return true;
00328 }
00329 
00330 bool EuropaReactor::hasWork() {
00331   m_assembly.setStream();
00332   debugMsg("trex:exec", "["<<getCurrentTick()<<"] Check for deliberation");
00333   if( m_assembly.invalid() ) {
00334     debugMsg("trex:exec", "["<<getCurrentTick()<<"] no deliberation (invalid)");
00335     return false;
00336   }
00337   if( m_assembly.active() ) {
00338     debugMsg("trex:exec", "["<<getCurrentTick()<<"] need deliberation (active)");
00339     return true;
00340   }
00341   if( m_completedThisTick ) {
00342     debugMsg("trex:exec", "["<<getCurrentTick()
00343             <<"] no deliberation (completed this tick)");
00344     return false;
00345   } else {
00346     debugMsg("trex:exec", "["<<getCurrentTick()
00347             <<"] need deliberation (did not run on this tick)");
00348     return true;
00349   }
00350 }
00351 
00352 void EuropaReactor::resume() {
00353   m_assembly.setStream();
00354   // syslog()<<"step "<<m_steps;
00355   if( m_assembly.invalid() ) {
00356     syslog("ERROR")<<"Cannot resume deliberation with an invalid database.";
00357     return;
00358   }
00359   if( m_assembly.solver().isExhausted() ) {
00360     syslog("WARN")<<"No plan found.";
00361     m_assembly.mark_invalid();
00362     return;
00363   }
00364   ++m_steps;
00365   if( !m_core.step() ) {
00366     if( !m_core.relax(false) ) 
00367       if( !m_core.relax(true) ) {
00368        syslog("ERROR")<<"Unable to recover from a plan inconsistancy.";
00369        return;
00370       }
00371     m_assembly.mark_active();
00372   }
00373 }

00375 //  - Europa interface callbacks
00376 
00377 void EuropaReactor::removed(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00378   EUROPA::TokenId active = tok;
00379   if( tok->isMerged() )
00380     active = tok->getActiveToken();
00381   TICK end_time = EUROPA::cast_basis(active->end()->lastDomain().getUpperBound());
00382   int delay = getCurrentTick()-end_time;
00383 
00384   europa_mapping::iterator i = m_external_goals.find(active->getKey());
00385   if( m_external_goals.end()!=i ) {
00386     m_external_goals.erase(i);
00387   } else {
00388     i = m_internal_goals.find(tok->getKey());
00389     if( m_internal_goals.end()!=i ) {
00390       if( delay>0 ) 
00391        syslog("goals")<<"Request ["<<i->second<<"] completed ("<<delay
00392                      <<" ticks ago).";
00393       else
00394        syslog("goals")<<"Request ["<<i->second<<"] completed.";
00395       m_internal_goals.erase(i);
00396     }
00397   }
00398 }
00399 
00400 void EuropaReactor::request(EUROPA::ObjectId const &tl, 
00401                          EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00402   EUROPA::TokenId active = tok;
00403   if( tok->isMerged() )
00404     active = tok->getActiveToken();
00405 
00406   europa_mapping::iterator i = m_external_goals.find(active->getKey());
00407   if( m_external_goals.end()==i ) {
00408     TREX::utils::Symbol name(tl->getName().toString());
00409     Goal myGoal(name, tok->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString());
00410 
00411     std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &attr = tok->parameters();
00412     
00413     // Get start, duration and end
00414     std::auto_ptr<TREX::transaction::DomainBase> 
00415       d_start(details::trex_domain(tok->start()->lastDomain())),
00416       d_duration(details::trex_domain(tok->duration()->lastDomain())),
00417       d_end(details::trex_domain(tok->end()->lastDomain()));
00418    
00419     // I do not check the domains as I assume that they are integerdomain ... 
00420     // and they should 
00421     myGoal.restrictTime(*dynamic_cast<TREX::transaction::IntegerDomain *>(d_start.get()),
00422                      *dynamic_cast<TREX::transaction::IntegerDomain *>(d_duration.get()),
00423                      *dynamic_cast<TREX::transaction::IntegerDomain *>(d_end.get()));
00424 
00425     for(std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId>::const_iterator j=attr.begin();
00426        attr.end()!=j; ++j) {
00427       std::auto_ptr<TREX::transaction::DomainBase> 
00428        dom(details::trex_domain((*j)->lastDomain()));
00429       TREX::transaction::Variable attr((*j)->getName().toString(), *dom);
00430       myGoal.restrictAttribute(attr);
00431    }
00432     
00433     goal_id request = postGoal(myGoal);
00434     if( request )
00435       m_external_goals[active->getKey()] = request;
00436   } 
00437 }
00438 
00439 void EuropaReactor::relax() {
00440   for(europa_mapping::const_iterator i=m_external_goals.begin();
00441       m_external_goals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00442     syslog("recall")<<"RECALL "<<i->second<<"(Europa ID : "<<i->first<<").";
00443     postRecall(i->second);    
00444   }
00445   m_external_goals.clear();  
00446 }
00447 
00448 void EuropaReactor::recall(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00449   EUROPA::TokenId active = tok;
00450   if( tok->isMerged() )
00451     active = tok->getActiveToken();
00452 
00453   europa_mapping::iterator i = m_external_goals.find(active->getKey());
00454   if( m_external_goals.end()!=i ) {
00455     goal_id g = i->second;
00456     m_external_goals.erase(i);
00457     syslog("recall")<<"RECALL "<<i->second;
00458     postRecall(g);
00459   }
00460 }
00461 
00462 void EuropaReactor::notify(EUROPA::ObjectId const &tl, 
00463                         EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00464   Observation obs(tl->getName().c_str(), 
00465                 tok->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString());
00466   
00467   std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &attr = tok->parameters();
00468   // populate the observation 
00469   for(std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId>::const_iterator j=attr.begin();
00470       attr.end()!=j; ++j) {
00471     std::auto_ptr<TREX::transaction::DomainBase> 
00472       dom(details::trex_domain((*j)->lastDomain()));
00473     TREX::transaction::Variable attr((*j)->getName().toString(), *dom);
00474     obs.restrictAttribute(attr);
00475   }
00476   postObservation(obs);
00477 }

00479 
00480 bool EuropaReactor::deactivate_solver() {
00481   m_assembly.solver().clear();
00482   return true;
00483 }
